title: Create and integrate Stack Teacher logo

requirements.summary: Generate Stack Teacher logo assets (horizontal variant with icon + wordmark, and standalone icon-only variant) that visually represent stacked layers using the site's tech-educational aesthetic and existing color palette
acceptanceCriteria: A horizontal logo image (icon + 'Stack Teacher' wordmark) is generated and saved under frontend/public/assets/generated/
A standalone icon-only variant is generated and saved under frontend/public/assets/generated/
The logo style is consistent with the site's existing tech-educational aesthetic and color palette
The icon clearly conveys stacked layers, blocks, or a teaching/knowledge metaphor

file_operations.description: Generate horizontal logo combining a stacked-layers geometric icon (three offset rectangular blocks forming a tower, in teal/cyan accent on dark background) with the wordmark 'Stack Teacher' in a clean sans-serif font. The logo must use the site's existing OKLCH-based color palette (dark backgrounds with accent tones) to maintain visual consistency with the tech-educational aesthetic. The horizontal layout places the icon on the left and text on the right, sized at 400x100 pixels for navbar use.

Generate standalone icon-only version featuring the same stacked-layers geometric mark (three offset rectangular blocks forming a tower) in the same teal/cyan accent color on dark background. This square 128x128 pixel variant will be used for mobile responsive scenarios and favicon purposes.

requirements.summary: Integrate the generated Stack Teacher logo into the sticky header navigation, replacing any existing text-only brand mark, with responsive behavior that shows the horizontal variant on desktop and gracefully adapts on mobile
acceptanceCriteria: The sticky header in Layout.tsx displays the Stack Teacher logo (horizontal variant) instead of plain text
The logo links to the home page ('/')
On mobile viewports the logo remains visible and does not overflow the header
The logo renders clearly on the site's dark/light header background without visual artifacts

file_operations.description: Replace the existing text-only brand mark in the sticky header with an img element displaying the horizontal logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/stack-teacher-logo-horizontal.dim_400x100.png. Wrap the img in a Link component pointing to '/'. Apply responsive sizing: on desktop the logo displays at appropriate navbar height (e.g., h-10 or h-12); on mobile viewports (sm and below) either scale down proportionally or conditionally switch to the icon-only variant frontend/public/assets/generated/stack-teacher-icon.dim_128x128.png to prevent overflow. Add alt text 'Stack Teacher' for accessibility. Ensure the logo contrasts well against the header's existing background color (the header already uses a dark background per the site aesthetic).
